alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 11 at 1:15PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph at times. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, particularly with strong crosswinds. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
